Name: A Strange City
About the game: A strange and gloomy city has turned into an obstacle course, night has come, the rain is pouring constantly and you need to escape from the crazy mechanical fish. In the distant future, in one of the parallel universes, a factory for the production of automatic construction machines failed. One of the experimental drilling machines is out of control and heading into the city, sweeping away everything in its path. The only employee of the plant, who fades for safety, is forced to run in search of salvation. Features of the game: It's always raining in a strange City. In a Strange City, you will be chased by a mechanical fish. There are many dangerous saws in the Strange City. In a Strange City, you will encounter broken security systems that shock you. In a Strange City, you will encounter broken security systems that throw spikes.
